title: Modulation of Charge Migration and Ink Flow Dynamics Exceeding 19% Efficiency for Blade-coating Pseudo-planar Heterojunction Organic Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01522C, Paper
Houdong Mao, Jiahua Zhang, Xin Cen, Jiayou Zhang, Lin Wen, Jingwei Xue, Dou Luo, Lifu Zhang, Zhao Qin, Wei Ma, Licheng Tan, Yiwang Chen
Constructing efficient and regular charge transport channels is essential to achieve high power conversion efficiency (PCE) in pseudo-planar heterojunction (PPHJ) organic solar cells (OSCs). Nanoimprint lithography (NIL) has been proven...
